## Plots
```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(tidyverse)
lterdatasampler::ntl_icecover %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = ice_duration, color = lakeid)) + 
  geom_point() +
  ylab("Ice duration") +
  xlab("Year") +
  theme_classic() +
  NULL
```
